name: Chickpea Aloo Chaat Bowl with Date Tamarind Chutney
description: Chickpea Aloo Chaat Bowl. Mint cilantro Potatoes, spiced chickpeas, tamarind date chutney bowl with onions, tomatoes and chaat masala. Papri Aloo Chana Chaat Bowl. Vegan gluten-free soy-free nut-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2  hot green chili  (or use cayenne to taste)
1/3 tsp or more kala namak (Indian sulphur black salt or Chaat masala)
15 oz can chickpeas or 1.5 cups cooked (or 1.5 cups sprouted brown chickpeas)
2  potatoes (boiled and cubed into small cubes, or coarsely mashed)
Indian Papri/Mathri crackers  (or other crackers or chips like sweet potato tortilla chips)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the mint chutney ingredients until coarsely blended. Taste and adjust salt and tang.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the mint chutney ingredients until coarsely blended. Taste and adjust salt and tang.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates in hot water for 15 minutes. Drain and blend with the rest of the ingredients. Use water as needed to make a smooth paste. Taste and adjust sweet and tang. (For a stronger flavor profile, bring the chutney to a boil, cool and use.) If you dont have tamarind paste, add more lemon/lime juice and kala namak for a sweet and sour chutney.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the dates in hot water for 15 minutes. Drain and blend with the rest of the ingredients. Use water as needed to make a smooth paste. Taste and adjust sweet and tang. (For a stronger flavor profile, bring the chutney to a boil, cool and use.) If you dont have tamarind paste, add more lemon/lime juice and kala namak for a sweet and sour chutney.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the chickpeas in 1/2 tsp chaat masala, 1/4 tsp ground cumin and 1/4 tsp cayenne.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss the chickpeas in 1/2 tsp chaat masala, 1/4 tsp ground cumin and 1/4 tsp cayenne.

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve 1 tbsp of mint cilantro chutney for garnish and add the rest to the potatoes and mix. Add 1/2 tsp chaat masala or 1/4 tsp kala namak and mix in. Taste and adjust salt and heat if needed. If using mashed potatoes, mix in the chutney in the mashed potatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Reserve 1 tbsp of mint cilantro chutney for garnish and add the rest to the potatoes and mix. Add 1/2 tsp chaat masala or 1/4 tsp kala namak and mix in. Taste and adjust salt and heat if needed. If using mashed potatoes, mix in the chutney in the mashed potatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpeas and potato to the bowl. Add chopped onions and tomatoes and crackers of choice and assemble as you like. Add chopped cucumber, apple or other veggies.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chickpeas and potato to the bowl. Add chopped onions and tomatoes and crackers of choice and assemble as you like. Add chopped cucumber, apple or other veggies.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the date tamarind chutney liberally and the remaining mint cilantro chutney. Sprinkle chaat masala, and some lemon juice. Serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sev if you like and arrange the mixture on the crackers to serve for a chaat style experience.
